doc.title: Ghosts of Odessa
doc.plot: Something is wrong with Odessa; The Russian fleets Typhoon-class nuclear cruising submarine lies dead on the ocean floor. When the sub is found mysteriously resting one thousand feet below the Pacific, a group of soldiers doing time in a federal prison, are sent in to learn more. Led by McCauley, they're specialists in military situations and technology. Convicted and serving hard time, they're reluctant mercenaries secretly sent into in high risk situations. But fathoms below the ocean surface lies a silent tomb, with a mystery of her crews death locked inside its frozen walls. They enter and discover they are not alone.....
